verses.verse: "I Have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with my eyes; <S%H5869><s%> How <S%H4100><s%> then could I gaze <S%H995><s%> at a virgin <S%H1330><s%>?
"And what <S%H4100><s%> is the portion <S%H2506><s%> of God <S%H433><s%> from above <S%H4605><s%> Or the heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> from on high <S%H4791><s%>?
"Is it not calamity <S%H343><s%> to the unjust, <S%H5767><s%> And disaster <S%H5235><s%> to those who work <S%H6466><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%>?
"Does He not see <S%H7200><s%> my ways, <S%H1870><s%> And number <S%H5608><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my steps <S%H6806><s%>?
"If <S%H518><s%> I have walked <S%H1980><s%> with falsehood, <S%H7723><s%> And my foot <S%H7272><s%> has hastened <S%H2363><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> deceit, <S%H4820><s%>
Let Him weigh <S%H8254><s%> me with accurate <S%H6664><s%> scales, <S%H3976><s%> And let God <S%H433><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> my integrity. <S%H8538><s%>

"If <S%H518><s%> my step <S%H838><s%> has turned <S%H5186><s%> from the way, <S%H1870><s%> Or my heart <S%H3820><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> <S%H1980><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> Or if any spot <S%H3971><s%> has stuck <S%H1692><s%> to my hands, <S%H3709><s%>
Let me sow <S%H2232><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> eat, <S%H398><s%> And let my crops <S%H6631><s%> be uprooted. <S%H8327><s%>
"If <S%H518><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> has been enticed <S%H6601><s%> by a woman, <S%H802><s%> Or I have lurked <S%H693><s%> at my neighbor's doorway, <S%H6607><s%>
May my wife <S%H802><s%> grind <S%H2912><s%> for another, <S%H312><s%> And let others <S%H312><s%> kneel <S%H3766><s%> down <S%H3766><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> her.
"For that would be a lustful <S%H2154><s%> crime; <S%H2154><s%> Moreover, it would be an iniquity <S%H5771><s%> [punishable by] judges. <S%H6414><s%>
"For it would be fire <S%H784><s%> that consumes <S%H398><s%> to Abaddon, <S%H11><s%> And would uproot <S%H8327><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my increase. <S%H8393><s%>

"If <S%H518><s%> I have despised <S%H3988><s%> the claim <S%H4941><s%> of my male <S%H5650><s%> or female <S%H519><s%> slaves <S%H519><s%> <S%H5650><s%> When they filed <S%H7378><s%> a complaint <S%H7379><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> me,

What <S%H4100><s%> then could I do <S%H6213><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H410><s%> arises, <S%H6965><s%> And when <S%H3588><s%> He calls <S%H6485><s%> me to account, <S%H6485><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> will I answer <S%H7725><s%> Him?
"Did not He who made <S%H6213><s%> me in the womb <S%H990><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> him, And the same <S%H259><s%> one <S%H259><s%> fashion <S%H3559><s%> us in the womb <S%H7358><s%>?
"If <S%H518><s%> I have kept <S%H4513><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> from [their] desire, <S%H2656><s%> Or have caused the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the widow <S%H490><s%> to fail, <S%H3615><s%>
Or have eaten <S%H398><s%> my morsel <S%H6595><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> And the orphan <S%H3490><s%> has not shared <S%H398><s%> <S%H4480><s%> it
(But from my youth <S%H5271><s%> he grew <S%H1431><s%> up with me as with a father, And from infancy <S%H1><s%> <S%H517><s%> I guided <S%H990><s%> her),
If <S%H518><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> anyone perish for lack <S%H6><s%> of clothing, <S%H1097><s%> Or that the needy <S%H3830><s%> had <S%H34><s%> no <S%H369><s%> covering, <S%H369><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> his loins <S%H2504><s%> have not thanked <S%H1288><s%> me, And if he has not been warmed <S%H2552><s%> with the fleece <S%H1488><s%> of my sheep, <S%H3532><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> I have lifted <S%H5130><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the orphan, <S%H3490><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> I had support <S%H5833><s%> in the gate, <S%H8179><s%>
Let my shoulder <S%H3802><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> from the socket, <S%H7926><s%> And my arm <S%H248><s%> be broken <S%H7665><s%> off <S%H7665><s%> at the elbow. <S%H7070><s%>
"For calamity <S%H343><s%> from God <S%H410><s%> is a terror <S%H6343><s%> to me, And because <S%H4480><s%> of His majesty <S%H7613><s%> I can <S%H3201><s%> do <S%H3201><s%> nothing. <S%H3808><s%>
"If <S%H518><s%> I have put <S%H7760><s%> my confidence <S%H3689><s%> [in] gold, <S%H2091><s%> And called <S%H559><s%> fine <S%H3800><s%> gold <S%H3800><s%> my trust, <S%H4009><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> I have gloated <S%H8055><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> my wealth <S%H2428><s%> was great, <S%H7227><s%> And because <S%H3588><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> had secured <S%H4672><s%> [so] much; <S%H3524><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I have looked <S%H7200><s%> at the sun <S%H216><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it shone, <S%H9096><s%> Or the moon <S%H3394><s%> going <S%H1980><s%> in splendor, <S%H3368><s%>
And my heart <S%H3820><s%> became <S%H6601><s%> secretly <S%H5643><s%> enticed, <S%H6601><s%> And my hand <S%H3027><s%> threw <S%H5401><s%> a kiss <S%H5401><s%> from my mouth, <S%H6310><s%>
That too <S%H1571><s%> would have been an iniquity <S%H5771><s%> [calling for] judgment, <S%H6416><s%> For I would have denied <S%H3584><s%> God <S%H410><s%> above. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%>
"Have I rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> at the extinction <S%H6365><s%> of my enemy, <S%H8130><s%> Or exulted <S%H5782><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> evil <S%H9563><s%> befell <S%H4672><s%> him?
"No, <S%H3808><s%> I have not allowed <S%H5414><s%> my mouth <S%H2441><s%> to sin <S%H2398><s%> By asking <S%H7592><s%> for his life <S%H5315><s%> in a curse. <S%H423><s%>
"Have the men <S%H4962><s%> of my tent <S%H168><s%> not said, <S%H559><s%> 'Who <S%H4310><s%> can find <S%H5414><s%> one who has not been satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with his meat <S%H1320><s%>'?
"The alien <S%H1616><s%> has not lodged <S%H3885><s%> outside, <S%H2351><s%> [For] I have opened <S%H6605><s%> my doors <S%H1817><s%> to the traveler. <S%H734><s%>
"Have I covered <S%H3680><s%> my transgressions <S%H6588><s%> like Adam, <S%H121><s%> By hiding <S%H2934><s%> my iniquity <S%H5771><s%> in my bosom, <S%H2243><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> I feared <S%H6206><s%> the great <S%H7227><s%> multitude, <S%H1995><s%> And the contempt <S%H937><s%> of families <S%H4940><s%> terrified <S%H2865><s%> me, And kept <S%H1826><s%> silent <S%H1826><s%> and did not go <S%H3318><s%> out of doors <S%H6607><s%>?

"Oh <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> that I had <S%H5414><s%> one to hear <S%H8085><s%> me! Behold, <S%H2005><s%> here <S%H2005><s%> is my signature; <S%H8420><s%> Let the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> me! And the indictment <S%H5612><s%> which my adversary <S%H7379><s%> has written, <S%H3789><s%>
Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> I would carry <S%H5375><s%> it on my shoulder; <S%H7926><s%> I would bind <S%H6029><s%> it to myself like a crown. <S%H5850><s%>
"I would declare <S%H5608><s%> to Him the number <S%H4557><s%> of my steps; <S%H6806><s%> Like <S%H3644><s%> a prince <S%H5057><s%> I would approach <S%H7126><s%> Him.
"If <S%H518><s%> my land <S%H127><s%> cries <S%H2199><s%> out against <S%H5921><s%> me, And its furrows <S%H8525><s%> weep <S%H1058><s%> together; <S%H3162><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I have eaten <S%H398><s%> its fruit <S%H3581><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> money, <S%H3701><s%> Or have caused its owners <S%H1167><s%> to lose <S%H5301><s%> their lives, <S%H5315><s%>

Let briars <S%H2336><s%> grow <S%H3318><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of wheat, <S%H2406><s%> And stinkweed <S%H890><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of barley. <S%H8184><s%>" The words <S%H1697><s%> of Job <S%H347><s%> are ended. <S%H8552><s%>
